introText: The Treasury Board Secretariat manages government operations, human resources, and administrative services, ensuring efficient and effective government service delivery across all ministries.
descriptionText: The Treasury Board Secretariat spent $1.4B in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 0.7% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports government operations, employee benefits, and emergency management.
roleText: Effective government operations require strong central administration. TBS coordinates across government, manages human resources, oversees emergency management, and ensures efficient use of public resources.
programsDescription: The Treasury Board Secretariat operates programs including human resources management, employee benefits administration, emergency management, procurement services, and government operational support.
